document.full_text: hundreds of insurgents who escaped from a jail in afghanistan's volatile south through a tunnel dug by the taliban must have received inside help from prison guards or officials, the afghan government said on tuesday.
document.title: afghan justice minister says mass jail escape had inside help
lines_and_colors: hundreds of insurgents who escaped from a jail in afghanistan's volatile south through a tunnel dug by the taliban must have received inside help from prison guards or officials, the afghan government said on tuesday.
